kv18.2:1.6: Abhinimmito jino satthā sammāsambuddho sabbaññū sabbadassāvī dhammassāmī dhammappaṭisaraṇoti?
kv18.2:2.6: Āyasmā ānando jino satthā sammāsambuddho sabbaññū sabbadassāvī dhammassāmī dhammappaṭisaraṇoti?
kv18.2:3.6: vitthārenapi kho ahaṁ, sāriputta, dhammaṁ deseyyaṁ;
kv18.2:3.7: saṅkhittavitthārenapi kho ahaṁ, sāriputta, dhammaṁ deseyyaṁ;
kv18.2:3.11: Tena hi buddhena bhagavatā dhammo desitoti.
kv18.2:4.6: sanidānāhaṁ, bhikkhave, dhammaṁ desemi, no anidānaṁ;
kv18.2:4.7: sappāṭihāriyāhaṁ, bhikkhave, dhammaṁ desemi, no appāṭihāriyaṁ;
kv18.2:4.8: tassa mayhaṁ, bhikkhave, abhiññāya dhammaṁ desayato no anabhiññāya, sanidānaṁ dhammaṁ desayato no anidānaṁ, sappāṭihāriyaṁ dhammaṁ desayato no appāṭihāriyaṁ karaṇīyo ovādo karaṇīyā anusāsanī;
kv18.2:4.9: alañca pana vo, bhikkhave, tuṭṭhiyā alaṁ attamanatāya alaṁ somanassāya—
kv18.2:4.10: sammāsambuddho bhagavā, svākkhāto dhammo, suppaṭipanno saṅgho’ti.
kv18.2:4.11: Imasmiñca pana veyyākaraṇasmiṁ bhaññamāne dasasahassilokadhātu akampitthā”ti.
kv18.2:4.14: Tena hi buddhena bhagavatā dhammo desitoti.
